relation: Hi, everyone!I was surfing the net for any new fics on my fave J-rock band Glay when I came across FicWad. I felt so happy when I found out I can again have a venue for my fics. I used to have my fics up on FanFiction.net but when they reformatted and I do not know where I can have my works be hosted online again, I totally stopped writing. I had lost the motiviation to write. Friends who have met me because of my works noticed that, too. With FicWad, I regained my inspiration to write. I hope to upload my previous works here, and add some more. Thank you very much, FicWad. Shiira Megumi Posted at 2006-10-21 5:55
Hi I like it here loads. I hope you have a good time. Posted at 2006-10-25 23:05
hey Shiira Megumi, would you PM me wen you get ur fics up?? that way ill be sure to check out ur stuff! peace and love, Saffron Posted at 2006-11-01 18:22
Nice to hear that you are back writing again! Posted at 2006-11-01 18:35
pageTitle: FicWad: fresh-picked original and fan fiction
